heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly cloudy with areas of fog. Showers becoming likely far south, otherwise scattered and diminishing. Lows from the mid 50s to around 60. Winds becoming light and variable.

heading: Wednesday
text: Areas of fog early, then mostly cloudy, except mostly to partly cloudy far north. Chance of showers along and south of Route 4, slight chance to the north. Highs from the upper 60s to mid 70s. Winds becoming north to northeast 5 to 10 mph.

heading: Wednesday Night
text: A rising chance of showers in the south and in the Adirondacks, chance elsewhere north.  Areas of valley fog. Lows from the mid 50s to around 60, with some lower 50s east of the Greens, and low to mid 60s in the broad valleys west. East to southeast winds 5 to 10 mph.
